snippet: An F.B.I. hunt for leakers of national security information has coincided with Senate consideration of new legislation designed to curb intelligence officials’ exchanges with reporters.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation hunt for leakers of national security information has cast a chill over press coverage of security issues; probe coincides with Senate consideration of new legislation designed to curb intelligence officials' exchanges with reporters.
lead_paragraph: An F.B.I. hunt for leakers of national security information has coincided with Senate consideration of new legislation designed to curb intelligence officials’ exchanges with reporters.

headline.seo: National Security Leaks Lead to F.B.I. Hunt and News Chill
headline.main: Inquiry Into U.S. Leaks Is Casting Chill Over Coverage
headline.print_headline: Inquiry of Leaks Is Casting Chill Over Coverage
